data.message:
Dear Team of CocaCola! First of all : Thank you for this fantastic chance! 😊 Like almost everyone here I would love to win tickets for Justin Bieber on Sunday of 2nd July. I have been staying in London for one month now, because I am here for an internship until August. Before I arrived I wanted to buy tickets, but it wasn't possible for me to pay, because I had to many costs for my stay in London. It would be fantastic to get the possibility to go there with your help. Furthermore my friend from Germany is coming to visit me on 2nd of July and would be an amazing surprise for her, too. 

I hope that I will be one of the lucky winners. 🍀

Best,
Katrin
